snippet.title: Psycho Shopper - Vic-20 +8k - Real Hardware
snippet.description:
A Mastertronic £1.99 game from 1984.
It looks like this might have originally been called Shopper, as the in-game text only calls it that.  The tape cover added Psycho, probably to make it sound better.  I can't see a 14 year old boy buying a game called Shopper, but Psycho Shopper sounds great!  Well, if you are 14 it probably does.
The game isn't really very good.  Similar to Frogger, but with four different screens, including one round a shop, which I found to be the easiest, even though it's the last screen.
Once you finish the first round, things get much harder, with added cars, and probably shoppers in the shop, but I didn't get to that the second time round.
